summary: "The Resident" is an American TV show about doctors and nurses working at a fake hospital in Atlanta. It aired on Fox from 2018 to 2023, with six seasons. The show looks at the good and bad parts of the healthcare system. It started on Fox after being bought from Showtime. Each season has around 14 episodes. The show was popular and got renewed several times before it was canceled in 2023.
title: The Resident (TV series)
